name: Sprint retro template
description:
A simple template for running sprint retros in FigJam. Feel free to modify to your needs.


Instructions

  • Insert a screenshot of your sprint burndown chart and quarterly goals to the sections on top
  • Set a timer for 6 minutes
  • Have everyone create their own notes for what went well, what didn't go well, and ideas for improvement
  • After the time's up, go through everyone's notes together and discuss


Made by Basedash
